title: Idyllic Ancient China Escape with Authentic Dining & Indoor Pool
description: A space for peace and tranquility, indulge in a luxurious stay imbued with history and culture at Hotel Indigo Lijiang Ancient Town, an IHG Hotel. Set along the historic Tea Horse Caravan Trail, the hotel’s striking design pays tribute to its noteworthy roots capturing both ancient caravan culture and local folklore to cultivate a bright and lush atmosphere. Relax in one of the many quaint courtyards, or experience a calming traditional tea ceremony at the hotel’s tea house.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Lijiang Ancient Town, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 111 Xing Wen Alley, Qi Yi Street, Old Town District, Lijiang, YN 674100, China

title: Lijiang Five-Star Heritage Haven
description: Only a 10-minute walk from the heritage heart of Lijiang, InterContinental Lijiang Ancient Town Resort, an IHG Hotel combines modern comfort with traditional design. Embark on a journey into the past by visiting the Old Town of Lijiang, a UNESCO Heritage site boasting 1000 years of history, or work up a sweat at the fitness centre or indoor pool. Then, savour traditional cuisine at the Basil Leaf restaurant or indulge in a refreshing beverage at the Lobby Lounge.
location_description: InterContinental Lijiang Ancient Town Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 276 Xianghe Road, Old Town District, Lijiang, 674100, China

title: Contemporary China Mountain Retreat with Breathtaking Views & Live-Chef Dining
description:
Set just beyond the cobbled lanes of Lijiang's old town, this refined retreat puts Yunnan's wild beauty on full display, with views that stretch across quiet villages to the jagged peaks of China's Jade Dragon Snow Mountain. Explore the region’s UNESCO-listed heritage, famous bridges and highland landscapes, or simply steep in the seclusion of your well-appointed room.

The architecture nods to traditional design, with sloping rooftops and a serene central pond reflecting the mountain above. Inside, the aesthetic shifts to crisp modern minimalism, where clean lines, soft tones and floor-to-ceiling glass offer a fresh counterpoint.

Days here might begin with a tea body scrub at the Mandara spa, followed by lunch at Open Kitchen where chefs slice, stir and sear your meal in full view. In the evening, head to ZUN for regional delicacies or dine outdoors at XI as the sun sinks behind the mountains.
offer_address: Shuhe Old Town Entrance Road Lijiang Yunnan Province, Lijiang, Yunnan, China, 674100
